00001 /*------ Definition of a template for Matrix_rle_[di](...) : *
00002  *                       --------     ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
00003  * i.e., included several times from ./abIndex.c
00004  *                                   ~~~~~~~~~~~
00005  */
00006 
00007 /* for all cases with an 'x' slot -- i.e. almost all cases ;
00008  * just redefine this in the other cases:
00009  */
00010 
00011 #ifdef _rle_d_
00012 
00013 # define Matrix_RLE_ Matrix_rle_d
00014 # define Type_x_ double
00015 # define STYP_x_ REAL
00016 # define SXP_ans  REALSXP
00017 
00018 #elif defined _rle_i_
00019 
00020 # define Matrix_RLE_ Matrix_rle_i
00021 # define Type_x_ int
00022 # define STYP_x_ INTEGER
00023 # define SXP_ans  INTSXP
00024 
00025 #else
00026 #  error "invalid _rle_ macro logic"
00027 #endif
00028 
00036 SEXP Matrix_RLE_(SEXP x_, SEXP force_)
00037 {
00038     int n = LENGTH(PROTECT(x_ = coerceVector(x_, SXP_ans)));
00039     Rboolean no_force = !asLogical(force_);
00040     if (no_force && n < 3) {
00041         UNPROTECT(1); return R_NilValue;
00042     } else {
00043         register Type_x_ lv;
00044         register int ln, i, c = 0;
00045         int n2 = (no_force) ? n / 3 : n;
00046         /* upper bound: ==> max RAM requirement 2 x n2, (= 2/3 n);
00047          * using 2 instead of 3 would need 50% more time, have max
00048          * RAM requirement 2.5x for savings of any size */
00049         Type_x_ *x = STYP_x_(x_), *val;
00050         int *len;
00051         const char *res_nms[] = {"lengths", "values", ""};
00052         SEXP ans;
00053         if(n > 0) { /* needed for force=TRUE */
00054             len = Calloc(n2, int);
00055             val = Calloc(n2, Type_x_);
00056 
00057             lv = x[0];
00058             ln = 1;
00059             for(i = 1; i < n; i++) {
00060                 if (x[i] == lv) {
00061                     ln++;
00062                 } else {
00063                     val[c] = lv;
00064                     len[c] = ln;
00065                     c++;
00066                     if (no_force && c == n2) { /* reached the "efficiency bound" */
00067                         Free(len);
00068                         Free(val);
00069                         UNPROTECT(1); return R_NilValue;
00070                     }
00071                     lv = x[i];
00072                     ln = 1;
00073                 }
00074             }
00075             val[c] = lv;
00076             len[c] = ln;
00077             c++;
00078         }
00079         ans = PROTECT(Matrix_make_named(VECSXP, res_nms));
00080         SET_VECTOR_ELT(ans, 0, allocVector(INTSXP, c)); /* lengths */
00081         SET_VECTOR_ELT(ans, 1, allocVector(SXP_ans, c)); /* values */
00082         if(n > 0) {
00083             Memcpy(INTEGER(VECTOR_ELT(ans, 0)), len, c);
00084             Memcpy(STYP_x_(VECTOR_ELT(ans, 1)), val, c);
00085         }
00086         setAttrib(ans, R_ClassSymbol, mkString("rle"));
00087 
00088         if(n > 0) { Free(len); Free(val); }
00089         UNPROTECT(2);
00090         return ans;
00091     }
00092 } /* Matrix_RLE_() template */
00093 
00094 #undef Matrix_RLE_
00095 #undef Type_x_
00096 #undef STYP_x_
00097 #undef SXP_ans
